verses.name: Psalms 65:9
verses.text: Thou visitest the earth, and waterest it: thou greatly enrichest it with the river of God, which is full of water: thou preparest them corn, when thou hast so provided for it.

verses.name: Psalms 65:10
verses.text: Thou waterest the ridges thereof abundantly: thou settlest the furrows thereof: thou makest it soft with showers: thou blessest the springing thereof.

verses.name: Psalms 65:11
verses.text: Thou crownest the year with thy goodness; and thy paths drop fatness.

verses.name: Psalms 65:12
verses.text: They drop upon the pastures of the wilderness: and the little hills rejoice on every side.
